XMVP.Story: { "title": "Wishful Thinking: A Dimensional Dilemma", "synopsis": "When a cynical app developer accidentally unleashes a chaotic djinn from a vintage smartphone, he's granted wishes that hilariously bend the laws of physics and force him to confront the absurdity of reality.", "characters": [ "Barnaby Finch (App Developer/Protagonist)", "Jinnifer (The Djinn)", "Brenda McMillan (Barnaby's Ex-Girlfriend/Tech Investor)", "Reginald Chumley (Rival App Developer)", "Professor Quentin Quibble (Eccentric Physicist)", "Officer Dolores Diaz (Skeptical Police Officer)" ], "theme": "Hero's Journey" }
XMVP.Meta: { "source_file": "Ex_Nihilo_Project", "hj24_map": true, "parody": true, "genesis_mode": true, "atu_theme": "ATU 331: The Spirit in the Bottle", "tlp_axiom": "A right-hand glove could be put on a left hand if it could be turned round in four-dimensional space." }
